Uses of Package
ie.gmit.sw

  • Classes in ie.gmit.sw used by ie.gmit.sw 
    Class Description
    Direction
    This allows the player to move in 4 direction.
    GameView
    This sets up 2 grid to be painted, one grid for the ground, and the second for the objects and player sprites.
    GameWindow
    This class creates the game panel.
    Grid
    This is used to access methods for creating the grids It can also be used to set and retrieve info from the grid
    GroundBuilder
    This class set the ground for the game.
    GroundTile
    This sets the condition for any ground tile, its type and if is walkable.
    GroundType
    These are the type of ground tiles available when loaded, they store an image for each type.
    ImageLoader
    Used for loading images, follows the path to the resources folder using the string directory
    ItemBuilder
    This is used to build items objects, it also states if the object is collectable or not.
    ItemTile
    This is for item tiles objects, used for anything that is not a character or ground.
    ItemType
    This enum is used to identify each type of item available in the game to add more item, you only need to add here and add the images to resources, true allows the item to be collectable
    Point
    Creates a position for an object, ground or sprite to be placed.
    SpriteBuilder
    Used to build character sprites.
    SpriteFactory.Type  
    SpriteTile
    This class set the direction of the object on start of the program.
    SpriteType
    This enum is used to identify each type of character available in the game to add more character, you only need to add the type here and in the factory and add the images to resources.
    Tile
    This class is used for the tile types, all sprites, ground and objects are tiles
